concept.title: Requirements
concept.shortdesc: Learn about the libraries and tools required to use AppMeasurement for Symbian.

conbody.p: You can download the AppMeasurement software from the Code Manager.

section.title: Symbian Device Library
section.p: The following files are required to use the AppMeasurement library on Symbian devices:
AppMeasurement.h: The Symbian C++ header file. This file can be placed in your project folder.

AppMeasurement.lib: Library designed for use on the Symbian device. Use this library for development and testing directly on the device, and include it with your shipping application. During development we recommend placing this file in the C:\QtSDK\Symbian\SDKs\Symbian1Qt463\epoc32\release\armv5\urel folder.

section.title: Symbian Emulator Library
section.p: When testing development using the Symbian Library, use the following file in place of the AppMeasurement.lib file:
LibAppMeasurement.a: Library designed for use with the Windows* Symbian emulator. Use this library while developing your Symbian application. This file can be placed in your project folder.

section.title: Development Tools
section.p: The following tools and versions were used to develop the AppMeasurement Libraries for Symbian:

section.title: About Multi-Threaded Applications
section.p: AppMeasurement for Symbian is not thread-safe. You can use it in a multi-threaded application, but you cannot access it from multiple threads.
